thread.title: Bourque helps unveil hockey-themed lottery ticket
thread.title_full: Bourque helps unveil hockey-themed lottery ticket - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Bourque helps unveil hockey-themed lottery ticket
text:
DURHAM, N.H. (AP) - Boston Bruins legend Ray Bourque is helping Gov. Maggie Hassan unveil New Hampshire's latest lottery ticket.
Bourque, a Hall of Fame defenseman who played 21 seasons with the Bruins, will take part in a ceremonial puck drop at the University of New Hampshire men's hockey game on Sunday.
The new $5 NHL Hockey scratch ticket goes on sale Monday, with a top prize of $100,000 and second-chance drawings for hockey-related prizes.
